Class Track

java.lang.Object
  Track

public class Track
extends java.lang.Object

Store the details of a music track, such as the artist, title, and file name.

Constructor Detail

Track

public Track(java.lang.String filename)
Constructor for objects of class Track. It is assumed that the file name cannot be decoded to extract artist and title details.

Parameters:
filename - The track file.
